clues.text:
Resurgent:
Adman James Jordan revived sluggish Wisk sales with the slogan "Ring around" this

Belligerent:
Era is advertised as having 3x this-fighting power

Omnipresent:
"Everything" is a synonym for the name of this Sun Products brand

Emergent:
Now there's "H.E. Turbo" Tide, H.E. short for this type of washer

Beneficent:
This detergent designed to make babies' clothes soft & fresh was introduced in 1933
Here's something about this "There's Something About Mary" star: she went to high school with Snoop Dogg
She's starred in movies like "Flirting with Disaster", "Spanglish" & "Fun with Dick and Jane"
He & Stephen Merchant created the British TV show "The Office"
This brunette plays "Community" college student Annie Edison
This comic actor lost 40 pounds for the role in "Moneyball" that earned him a supporting actor Oscar nomination

rounds.comments: (Alex: Each correct response will come after the word "glow" in a dictionary, and as a matter of fact, it will begin with the same two letters.)

clues.text: We're sticking with the fact that it's obtained by boiling hooves

According to the proverb, you should always do this "on the bright side"

"Once" this, "twice shy"

From 1941-66 the Camel sign in Times Square produced one of these every 4 seconds
Mammy & Pappy Yokum lived in this community

rounds.text: The title of this musical that opened on Broadway in 1964 was inspired by a Marc Chagall painting
